main event: In January 1958, a military pilot flying a T-36D aircraft observed a yellow-white metallic, disc-shaped object that changed position relative to the aircraft before disappearing after approximately 7 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as disc-shaped, like two pie tins placed together with inverted rims.
It changed its position relative to the aircraft, moving both above and below the aircraft with its reflective surface exposed.
The sighting lasted for approximately 7 minutes before the object disappeared.
No further investigation was directed by the headquarters after the report was filed.
The report indicated that the observed object was possibly a balloon or astronomical in nature.
